#Getting and Cleaning Data - Coursera Project
This repository contains the R code and documentation for the "Human Activity Recongition using Smartphones" tidy data project. 

##Files
1) run_analysis.R: R script contains the 5 steps in the data cleaning. 
2) Tidydata_final.txt: This contains the exported tidy dataset which averages for each activity and subject.
3) CodeBook.md: Describes the variables, data and transformations performed.
README.md: This explains how the script works. 

##Instructions
1) Download data from the link "https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/getdata%2Fprojectfiles%2FUCI%20HAR%20Dataset.zip"
2) Unzip the folder into your working directory
3) Run source("run_analysis.R") in RStudip
4) The script will generate a file called "Tidydata_final.txt" in your directory.
